name: Amazing Classic Bubble
description:
Amazing Classic Bubble is very easy to play & interesting Game with fun bubbles, color bomb & sweet bubble. Match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop and win with less shots to get more stars!

Features
- Addictive gameplay. Play and enjoy hours of endless fun.
- Hundreds of incredible levels packed with fun puzzles and challenges.
- Bubble swap is free, simply tap on your bubble to change its color
- Awesome graphics and effects
- Super fun and addictive bubble shooter game you won’t stop playing!
